revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== {{suffix|en|xanthate|ation}} ===Noun=== {{en-noun}} # {{lb|en|chemistry}} [[convert|Conversion]] into a [[xanthate]]. #* '''1971''', K V Sarkanen, Charles Heberle Ludwig, ''Lignins: Occurrence, Formation, Structure and Reactions'' #*: The participation of the hydroxyl groups of lignin in '''xanthation''' reactions has also been studied. [[Category:English 3-syllable words]]
